sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_include_4552128607a2301029a8f0269c1ed057
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script_include"><sys_ux_client_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><api_name>x_683715_big_oil_2.Choice list default value from GlideForm</api_name><includes/><name>Choice list default value from GlideForm</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function include({ imports }) {
  return {
    getChoiceFields: function (fieldElements, fieldName) {
      var target = fieldElements.filter(function (field) {
        return field.name === fieldName;
      });

      var choices = target[0].choices;
      var retList = [];

      choices.forEach(function (el) {
        var obj = {};

        obj.id = el.value;
        obj.label = el.displayValue;
        obj.value = el.value;
        retList.push(obj);
      });

      return retList;
    },
  };
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-13 22:02:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>4552128607a2301029a8f0269c1ed057</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Choice list default value from GlideForm</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Big Oil 2" source="x_683715_big_oil_2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Big Oil 2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_include_4552128607a2301029a8f0269c1ed057</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-13 22:04:09</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script_include></record_update>
